name: Cubes Craft 2
description:
Cubes CrafCreate your dream world!t 2 is a block game in a virtual world, which allow you to build everything in a 3D environment. You can build or destroy blocks, buildings, bridges while you are surviving...
You can build everything in here what you want to build in real life.
Visit dark caves and explore the underwater world!
Create your character and enjoy the new worlds for free!

GAME FEATURES

- Mobile optimized high definition graphics.
- FPS and mobile touch control system.
- Changeable Texture Quality and Day Length.
- Adjustable joystick sensitivity and nature sound.
- New worlds, new characters.
- Different blocks in every world.
- Real life weather, season and day state system.
- Underwater and breath system.
- Headlamp and battery system.

Have fun for free!
